entry.def: Calipers are an instrument consisting of two long, thin pieces of metal joined together at one end, and are used to measure the size of things.

entry.tran: (装在腿上帮助行走的)双脚规形夹
entry.def: Calipers are devices consisting of metal rods held together by straps, which are used to support a person's legs when they cannot walk properly.
